dmca.title: Web DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Unfortunately, one of your members has posted material that breaches the copyright of our several of our World Guide sites.

Therefore we wish to issue the following DMCA complaint:

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

(Signature on File)

2.The text copied is as follows:

http://www.sharm-el-sheikh.world-guides.com/sharm_el_sheikh_shopping.html
http://www.marbella.world-guides.com/marbella_beaches.html
http://www.mallorca.world-guides.com/beaches.html
http://www.marbella.world-guides.com/marbella_travel.html
http://www.san-sebastian.world-guides.com/san_sebastian_travel.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/aswan_attractions.html
http://www.abu-dhabi.world-guides.com/abu_dhabi_attractions.html
http://www.hurghada.world-guides.com/hurghada_attractions.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/aswan_travel.html
http://www.granada.world-guides.com/granada_travel.html
http://www.hurghada.world-guides.com/hurghada_shopping.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/aswan_shopping.html
http://www.alexandria.world-guides.com/alexandria_shopping.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/index.html
http://www.hurghada.world-guides.com/hurghada_travel.html
http://www.alexandria.world-guides.com/alexandria_travel.html

3. The original material can be viewed here:

http://www.sharm-el-sheikh.world-guides.com/sharm_el_sheikh_shopping.html
http://www.marbella.world-guides.com/marbella_beaches.html
http://www.mallorca.world-guides.com/beaches.html
http://www.marbella.world-guides.com/marbella_travel.html
http://www.san-sebastian.world-guides.com/san_sebastian_travel.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/aswan_attractions.html
http://www.abu-dhabi.world-guides.com/abu_dhabi_attractions.html
http://www.hurghada.world-guides.com/hurghada_attractions.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/aswan_travel.html
http://www.granada.world-guides.com/granada_travel.html
http://www.hurghada.world-guides.com/hurghada_shopping.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/aswan_shopping.html
http://www.alexandria.world-guides.com/alexandria_shopping.html
http://www.aswan.world-guides.com/index.html
http://www.hurghada.world-guides.com/hurghada_travel.html
http://www.alexandria.world-guides.com/alexandria_travel.html

4.  Contact: [redacted] - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +[redacted]
Email: info@world-guides.com
Address: [redacted], Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials I will submit via email and allege to be infringing are not authorized by World Guides the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information I submit in each and every notification I will send to Google will be accurate and that I
will be at the time of notification the copyright owner or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed..

Many thanks for your help, please advise if you require any further information.

I look forward to hearing from you shortly.

[redacted]WORLD GUIDES

N.B. None of the content on this site is original much of it from World Guides and we will supply further complaints when we have the time.
